CREATE TABLE if not exists chat ( `id` INT PRIMARY KEY auto_increment, `current_user_id` INT NOT NULL, `another_user_id` INT NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (current_user_id) REFERENCES `user`(id), FOREIGN KEY (another_user_id) REFERENCES `user`(id) ); create table if not exists message( `id` INT PRIMARY KEY auto_increment, `chat_id` INT NOT NULL, `sender_id` INT NOT NULL, `receiver_id` INT NOT NULL,
`content` TEXT, `sent_at` TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
FOREIGN KEY (`chat_id`) REFERENCES `chat`(id), FOREIGN KEY (`sender_id`) REFERENCES `user`(id), FOREIGN KEY (`receiver_id`) REFERENCES `user`(id) )
